programme.title: Meteoroloogia eesliinil
The Weather: The Race to Forecast
programme.desc: Meteoroloogia on teinud viimastel kümnenditel hiigeledusamme ning et ilmaennustused oleksid täpsed, saadetakse üles uusi satelliite, täiustatakse arvutimudeleid ja tehakse üha rohkem mõõtmisi. Ilmaennustus on igapäevaelu kindel osa, ent kuidas see sünnib, on üldiselt teadmata. Film uurib, kuidas teadlased oma prognoose igal aastal täiustavad ja aitavad katastroofe vältida.

programme.title: Kultuuristuudio. Kirjandusministri juures

programme.title: Lehmaelu
Cow
programme.desc: Eksperimentaalne Briti dokumentaalfilm jälgib nelja aasta jooksul ühe täiesti tavalise lüpsilehma Luna igapäevaelu ja -toimetusi. Tulemuseks on ilustamata pilguheit kariloomade monotoonsesse ja trööstitusse maailma, mis tekitab ebamugavaid küsimusi selle kohta, kuidas loomsed toiduained meie söögilauale jõuavad ning kas meie vajaduste rahuldamine õigustab teistele elusolenditele kannatuste põhjustamist.

programme.title: PÖFFi kaheksa ja pool

Intervjuud režissööride ja asjaosalistega heidavad lisaks festivalile ka laiema kõrvalpilgu filmimaastikul toimuvale, oma sõna ütlevad sekka ka filmispetsialistid ning -kriitikud. Toimetajad Kaspar Viilup ja Kaisa Potisepp, režissöör Jan Jonatan Karits, produtsent Age Kraus.(n)

programme.title: Kurjategijad

programme.title: Saladuslik Aafrika
programme.desc: Oleme Beninis. Hommikul teeme tiiru Nokoué järvel, kus elavad tofinud. See rahvakild põgenes maismaalt järvele Dahomey orjaküttide eest juba XVII sajandil. Ja järvel asub mitte küla, vaid lausa 2030 tuhande elanikuga linn. Ühest majast teise saab minna mõistagi üksnes paadiga. Sõidame mööda majast, kust kostab lõbus laul, trall ja pillerkaar. Kas suurejooneline pulm? Ei, selgub, et tegemist on hoopis kadunukese teise ilma ärasaatmispeoga. Aafrikas seiklesid Tiina Jokinen ja Peeter Vähi.(n)

programme.title: Mina olen Zlatan
Jag är Zlatan
programme.desc: R: Jens Sjörgen. Samanimelisel autobiograafial põhinev sporditraama, maailmakuulsa jalgpalluri Zlatan Ibrahimovici kujunemislugu. Balkani immigrantide järeltulijana kasvas Zlatan (Dominic Andersson Bajraktati, Granit Rushiti) Rootsi äärelinnas, pobleemse käitumisega poisi päästis terendavast pisipätielust jalgpall. Käitumisprobleemid saadavad Zlatanit siiani, legendaarne on ta aga siiski üliandeka ründajana. Zlatani sportlasetee algus oli aga kõike muud kui roosiline ja kindel.(n)

programme.title: The Edge of Seventeen
programme.desc: The 17-year-old Nadine tries to make sense of the challenges thrown down her way as she grows up, suffering the depression of losing her father, and a shattered friendship with Krista who dates Nadine's brother, Darian. Nadine finds solace with her teacher, Mr. Bruner, and a talented classmate.

programme.title: The Commuter
programme.desc: A former cop's commute takes a dark turn when his wife's life is held as leverage against him identifying a mysterious passenger on the train he is on. With time running out, the stakes have never been so high as he is drawn into a complex conspiracy with a deadly outcome.

programme.title: Taken 3
programme.desc: Ex-government operative Bryan Mills finds his life shattered when he's falsely accused of a murder that hits close to home. As he's pursued by a savvy police inspector, Mills employs his particular set of skills to track the real killer and exact his unique brand of justice.

programme.title: Conviction
programme.desc: When her brother is sentenced to life in prison for a crime he didn't commit, Betty Anne Waters goes through the ultimate struggle to prove his innocence.

programme.title: Home Alone 2: Lost in New York
programme.desc: On the way to a family vacation in Florida, Kevin McCallister boards the wrong plane and finds himself alone without his family yet again. As he makes New York his playground using his father's credit card, he stumbles on the recently-escaped Wet Bandits, and has to use his wits to outprank them.

programme.title: Mad Money
programme.desc: Bridget Cardigan has an easy life, until her husband, Don, loses his high-paying job, and she is forced to work to pay off his debts. She finds a job as a cleaner at the Federal Reserve Bank in Kansas, leading her to come up with a plan to steal some money in order to keep her house, together with her colleagues Nina and Jackie.

programme.title: Life of Crime
programme.desc: The story is about Mickey (Jennifer Aniston), the wife of corrupt businessman Frank (Tim Robbins), who gets kidnapped by criminals who extorted her husband and demanded a ransom. Things go against the expected.

programme.title: The Spy Who Dumped Me
programme.desc: Audrey and Morgan, are two best friends in their thirties who unwittingly become entangled in an international conspiracy when Audery's ex-boyfriend suddenly shows up at their apartment with a team of deadly assassins on his trail.

programme.title: Gringo
programme.desc: An American businessman who’s just starting his business with a small share in a pharmaceutical company, gets all his plans derailed when he gets involved in events way over his head when in Mexico.

programme.title: Happythankyoumoreplease
programme.desc: The film asks important questions about love, life and human relationships through a group of people living in New York. Like Sam who finds a lost boy on the subway, and his friend Annie who's looking for love.

programme.title: Third Person
programme.desc: Across three cities, three couples struggle through various life hurdles, fighting their way through personal and professional challenges as they connect through one common denominator: love.

programme.title: Couples Retreat
programme.desc: Two couples go to a couples’ resort for a romantic retreat. There, they relive their honeymoons and reinvigorate their marriages, however, they also encounter a series of comic predicaments at the same time.

programme.title: The Vow
programme.desc: After a car accident leaves Paige with a severe memory loss, her husband Leo tries to get her to love him again.

programme.title: The Five-Year Engagement
programme.desc: After being in a relationship for a year, Tom decides to propose to his girlfriend, Violet. Changes in their careers force them to postpone their wedding, which leads to extending their engagement period to reach four years. They then have to finalize pending issues in order to get married.

programme.title: Us
programme.desc: A mother and father take their children to their beach house, expecting to enjoy time with friends, but their serenity turns into chaos when some visitors arrive uninvited.

programme.title: Garfield
programme.desc: The lazy cat Garfield is annoyed when his owner, Jon, gets a new dog in order to impress his old high school crush Liz. When the dog, Odie, is locked outside one day by Garfield, he runs away and is subsequently kidnapped. It's up to Garfield and his animal friends to rescue him.(n)

programme.title: Brick Mansions
programme.desc: In a dystopian future, an unlikely partnership is formed between an ex-con and an undercover cop in the walled-off Detroit. With a local kingpin threatening to destroy the whole city, the two men must find a common ground in order to bring him down.(n)

programme.title: Colombiana
programme.desc: In 1992 Bogota, a small girl Cataleya, witnesses the murder of her parents by one of the terrorists' bands. Her uncle Emilio, helps her to recover and teaches her to take revenge from her parents killers. After getting prepared and trained on different sorts of weapons Cataleya starts planning for payback.(n)

programme.title: Takers
programme.desc: A group of robbers attempt to steal $20 million while a police officer gets in the way and events follow.(n)

programme.title: 21 Bridges
programme.desc: With Manhattan locked down to aid with the search for a pair of cop killers, Det. Andre Davis slowly puts together the clues of a vast conspiracy that puts a different spin on their manhunt.(n)

programme.title: Triple 9
programme.desc: A gang plans a big heist with a group of corrupt cops, by calling in a 999 dispatch, which is code for “officer down” to lure out a rookie officer, in order for them to pull-off their heist – their plan take unforeseen turns when an unsuspected member has a change of mind.(n)

programme.title: How to Be Single
programme.desc: Alice, Robin, Lucy, Meg, Tom and David live in New York, a city full of lonely wandering hearts. One purpose brings all of them together: the need to learn to sustain being single in a time when our definition of love is constantly changing.

programme.title: War
programme.desc: After his partner is killed by the elusive assassin Rogue, FBI agent John Crawford swears revenge on the infamous assassin who set off a crime war between two Asian gangs.

programme.title: Zookeeper
programme.desc: When the zookeeper decides to quit winning back his ex-girlfriend, the animals try to teach him the ways of love.

programme.title: Hansel & Gretel: Witch Hunters
programme.desc: Putting a twist on the old fairytale, "Hansel & Gretel" brings us the siblings as grown up bounty hunters who track and kill witches all over the world. As the Blood Moon approaches, the pair encounter a new evil that might hold a secret to their past.

programme.title: Pulp Fiction
programme.desc: Two mobsters are tasked by their boss to retrieve a briefcase and take care of his wife for a few days, as he makes a deal with a boxer to throw the match. But their mission turns into a shootout, the wife overdoses and the boxer double-crosses their crime boss, intertwining all of their lives.

programme.title: Kill Bill: Vol. 1
programme.desc: Beatrix Kiddo wakes up from a 4-year-coma, after losing her baby, she decides to take revenge on the assassins members who tried to kill her. After she decided to leave them to start a new life and get married without telling Bill, her former lover and boss.

programme.title: Kill Bill: Vol. 2
programme.desc: The bride, Uma Thurman, returns to complete her vengeance against her former boss, Bill, and his gang who deprived her of her baby. The bride wants to kill all the members of the team, which she was a part of, as well as Bill (David Carradine) who was once her lover.

programme.title: 16 Blocks
programme.desc: Detective Jack Mosley, who is an alcoholic, is assigned a last minute mission after a hard day's work. The mission is to escort a witness 16 blocks from the police station to the courthouse, but he discovers that several people want the witness dead, and Jack is faced with an unlikely situation where he has to choose between his duty and his loyalty to his police officer colleagues.

programme.title: Edison
programme.desc: After encountering a den of degenerate police officers, a young journalist makes partners with a reporter and an investigator, before he can fully realize the extent of the criminality around him.

programme.title: Warm Bodies
programme.desc: After R (a highly unusual zombie) saves Julie from a zombie attack, the two form an unusual bond that sets in motion a sequence of events that could transform the entire lifeless world.

programme.desc: Connor struggles at school with bullies, and pity looks from everyone, and at home with his mother's sickness. He starts fighting his feelings of guilt and anger, and facing those who bully him at school but his biggest problem is his inability to tell the truth and to acknowledge problems. So Connor seeks the help of a tree monster to overcome his problems.

programme.title: The Fighter
programme.desc: The life story of Mickey Ward, and his relationship with his brother Dicky, who is more famous than him in the boxing ring, as well as his exposure to a world of poverty, crime and drugs.

programme.title: Born to Fight
programme.desc: Bullied by his classmates, Matthew is taken under the wing of former boxer-turned-janitor Dan Barnes who teaches him how to fight and stand up for himself. The bond between the two enables Matthew to face off against his bullies and deal with his traumatizing past.

programme.title: The Brawler
programme.desc: The true story of how a then-virtually unknown boxer, Chuck Wepner, challenged Muhammad Ali, the heavyweight champion in 1975.

programme.title: Warrior
programme.desc: Tommy goes back to his hometown to be trained by his ex-boxer, alcoholic father for a big boxing competition and when the time comes, he finds himself face-to-face with his estranged older brother, Brendan, in the ring.

programme.title: I, Tonya
programme.desc: Tonya Harding, a competitive ice skater, is rising up the ranks at the U.S. Figure Skating championships and her life and career seem to only be getting better. However when her ex-husband gets himself involved, her future in the sport is endangered.

programme.title: Eagle Eye
programme.desc: Jerry and Rachel meet each other through a mysterious phone call from a woman they've never met, threatening their lives and pushing them into a chain of risky situations by using modern technology and carefully monitoring their movements.

programme.title: Need for Speed
programme.desc: After being imprisoned for a crime he didn't commit, a street racer joins a cross-country race with a plan for revenge. When his ex-partner learns of his intentions, he places a bounty on his head as the race starts.

programme.title: The Dark Knight Rises

programme.desc: A mission to protect a young woman from an evil gang turns into something more when Special Forces agent Lin learns that his missing daughter has become the recipient of a bio-chemical invention, sending him on a quest that uncovers a wider conspiracy.

programme.title: Killers
programme.desc: Spencer is an undercover assassin who falls in love with Jen and he decides to retire and marry her. After several years, he finds huge reward to kill him, which makes him doubt everyone around him ,so he hides at Jen's father, who was also an assassin and he tries to help him.

programme.title: I, Frankenstein

programme.desc: Agent J's newest mission is to find Agent K and try to restore his memory in one last attempt to prevent the re-appearance of a case that might just bring the downfall of humanity.

Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald
programme.desc: After his arrest with the help of Newt Scamander, Grindelwald manages to escape from the grip of the Magical Congress of the United States of America and sets out to gather his followers. Albus Dumbledore decides to enlist Scamander in order to defeat this upcoming danger.

programme.title: Crazy Stupid Love
programme.desc: When his seemingly perfect life with his wife starts showing its cracks, Cal is left adrift in the face of their impending divorce. His newfound friend Jacob tries to help him get over his loneliness and get back in the dating scene by being his wingman as he tries to pick up girls at bars.

programme.title: Inception
programme.desc: Armed with a technology that enables him to enter people's dreams and get access to their subconscious, Dom is hired to carry out a complicated task: set up the perfect circumstances to plant an idea in the mind of a businessman in the dream world.

programme.title: It: Chapter Two
programme.desc: Twenty seven years after their encounter with the evil clown Pennywise, the Losers Club are united again ,as they return to their hometown after receiving a devastating phone call that makes them face IT once more.

programme.title: The Bank Job
programme.desc: This film takes place in 1970s London; Terry Leather is a salesmen, happily married with children, and few secrets to keep. When an old friend, Martine Love, offers up a scheme to make some quick cash, Terry finds himself unable to refuse. With the help of a carefully selected crew including Kevin Swain and David Shilling, they rent a warehouse on Baker Street and begin tunneling to the nearby Loyd Bank. With their eye on the money stored in the bank’s safety deposit boxes, the crew finds themselves in for much more than they bargained.

programme.title: Sleight
programme.desc: In the wake of his parents' death, a street magician struggles to take care of his only sister. As he turns to drug dealing to provide for her, he ends up in over his head, which ends with his supplier kidnapping his sister as leverage. He must rely on his resilience and magic to save her.

programme.title: Roman J Israel, Esq.
programme.desc: The idealistic defense lawyer Roman J. Israel is trying to take over responsibility after his partner has suffered a heart attack. Under pressure to find a new job, he works with his partner's friend George. He exploits one of the cases he's working on to his advantage, putting him in a major problem.

programme.desc: In a broken city full of injustice and corruption, when an ex-cop is betrayed, he seeks to exact revenge on the city's most notorious public figure, Nicholas Hostetler, in an attempt to get his salvation.

programme.title: Gladiator
programme.desc: During the time of the Roman empire, Emperor Marcus Aurelius decides that his heir will be General Maximus. However, his son, Commodus, murders him before he has a chance to act on his decision, and he becomes the Emperor after his father. Commodus then decides that Maximus must be killed, who in a turn of events, becomes a gladiator and a hero in people's eyes.

programme.title: Anything for Love
programme.desc: While setting up their online dating profiles, Kate and Jack's friends encourage them to lie. But when the two are matched, their lies threaten to destroy the connection that they have made.

programme.title: All Yours
programme.desc: When she is in need of someone to take care of her children, the widowed attorney Casey finds her man in Matt, a family friend that she hires as a nanny. With Matt added to the mix, Casey finds her family life completely changed and sparks start to fly between her and Matt.

programme.title: Playing for Keeps
programme.desc: George Dryer, a charming former Scottish football star, is down on his luck and unable to find a sports-related job to pay his bills. He has a minimal connection with his son, Lewis, but as his ex-wife, Stacie, decides to remarry, he gets despondent and decides to pull his life together for his son and to win her back. To do this, he must rise above temptations, bribery and wrong career choices.

programme.title: The Horse Whisperer
programme.desc: A young horse rider gets in an accident that leaves her and her horse badly injured. Despite recommendations to put the horse to sleep, her mother enlists the help of a known horse trainer to help both the horse and the girl.

programme.title: Raising Helen
programme.desc: Helen (Kate Hudson) is a rising model who works for a top modeling agency, spending her days at work and her nights at the city's hottest clubs. Amidst the carefree and excessive life she is leading, she receives a phone call that drastically changes her life: she is now responsible for her sister's three children: 15-year-old Audrey, 10-year-old Henry, and 5-year-old Sarah.

programme.title: The Hurricane
programme.desc: Rubin Carter is a middleweight boxer who managed to escape the tragedies and sufferings of his childhood. He is hopeful about the future, but his hopes are thwarted when he is accused of murder and imprisoned.

programme.title: Malcolm X
programme.desc: A biography of the African-American Muslim minister and human rights activist Malcolm X, who started his life as a gangster before converting to Islam and finally getting assassinated in 1965.

programme.title: American Gangster
programme.desc: In 1970, a detective is working to bring down the drug empire of Frank Lucas, a top heroin trafficker from Manhattan, who smuggled drugs into the country from the Far East.

programme.title: Mother!
programme.desc: When uninvited guests enters their life, a tranquil couple faces nervousness and disorder.

programme.title: The Iceman
programme.desc: In the year 1960, Richard becomes a hit-man, and throughout the years gains a good reputation in his job for being heartless, and becomes the best in his field. programme.desc: Orphaned by the brutal Civil war in Sudan that began in 1983, these young victims traveled as many as a thousand miles on foot in search of safety. Fifteen years later, a humanitarian effort would bring 3600 lost boys and girls to America.

programme.title: Life of Crime
programme.desc: The story is about Mickey (Jennifer Aniston), the wife of corrupt businessman Frank (Tim Robbins), who gets kidnapped by criminals who extorted her husband and demanded a ransom. Things go against the expected.

programme.desc: After her parents separate, Elissa moves with her mother to their dream house in the country. But the dream is disturbed when they learn that the house at the end of their street was the scene of a violent crime where a girl killed her parents.

Colleagues, best friends and roommates Leonard and Sheldon have a relationship that is being continuously tested by Sheldon's deeply eccentric and non-convential attitude. They're also friends with their colleagues mechanical engineer Howard Wolowitz and astrophysicist Rajesh Koothrappali. With Penny moving across the hall, Leonard has a new aspiration in life besides physics.

programme.title: The War with Grandpa

programme.title: Operation Arctic
programme.desc: Three siblings find themselves alone on the island of Spitsbergen, where they must join hands to survive a severe snowstorm on one hand and predator bears on the other.(n)

programme.title: Help And Freedom
programme.desc: An animated family comedy that follows the daily routine of a group of animals. The distinct quality of these animals, however, is that like any human being, they have the primary instinct to want to make something out of their lives.(n)

programme.title: Mia and the Migoo
programme.desc: After the death of her mother, Mia tries to find her father, who was trapped in a landslide at a construction site following a natural disaster. Joined by Migoo and her friends, Mia sets out to find her father.(n)

programme.title: The Wheelers
programme.desc: A small group of friends who call themselves The Wheelers, ride the streets on their skateboards to protect their neighborhood from crime, meet a friendly alien on the run and decide to help him.(n)

programme.title: The Wish Fish
programme.desc: Opil is an 8-year-old boy who detests the dish called 'The Wish Fish' that his mother makes. Resentful of the meal, he wishes that aliens invade the planet and all the fish will vanish. When the wish comes true, a group of villains appears, and Opil starts to realize what he has done.(n)

programme.title: Hunter's Prayer
programme.desc: Sam, an assassin who is appointed to kill a woman, fails to pull the trigger to kill her. He then eventually has to cooperate with her to escape the ones who had killed her family and bring them to justice.

programme.title: Warrior
programme.desc: Tommy goes back to his hometown to be trained by his ex-boxer, alcoholic father for a big boxing competition and when the time comes, he finds himself face-to-face with his estranged older brother, Brendan, in the ring.

programme.title: Law Abiding Citizen
programme.desc: When a legal loophole leaves one of the murderers of his family free, Clyde steps in to brutally correct the miscarriage of justice. But taking the lives of the two murderers is not enough; he intends to go after everyone who couldn't get them an appropriate sentence, including the DA.

programme.title: War
programme.desc: After his partner is killed by the elusive assassin Rogue, FBI agent John Crawford swears revenge on the infamous assassin who set off a crime war between two Asian gangs.

programme.title: The Expendables
programme.desc: Barney Ross leads a team of skilled mercenaries to assassinate a merciless dictator of a small South American island, only to find themselves caught in a dangerous web of betrayal.

programme.title: Maze Runner: The Scorch Trials
programme.desc: Thomas and his fellow Gladers try to regain their lives again after escaping from the maze, but find that life outside the maze is a desolate waste land full of blood-thirsty zombies. At the same time they're trying to find clues to guide them to the organization behind the maze.

programme.title: Angel Has Fallen
programme.desc: When Secret Service agent Mike Banning is framed for attempting to assassinate the president, he escapes his agency and the FBI to uncover the real threat and stop them before its too late.

programme.title: Marauders
programme.desc: An FBI agent is chasing a gang of professional thieves who leave no trace behind them. He discovers that the gang is not just targeting armed robberies on banks but committing murders as well.

programme.title: Acts of Violence
programme.desc: Roman and his ex-military brothers embark on a mission to save his fiancée from the grip of human traffickers who kidnapped her, while joining forces with a cop who is going after the criminal ring.

programme.title: The Forbidden Kingdom
programme.desc: Jason is obsessed with martial arts and kung-fu movies. One day he discovers an ancient stick that used to belong to the Monkey King, and when he holds it, he is transported back to ancient China.

programme.title: The Hunger Games: Catching Fire
programme.desc: The repressed Panem is on the verge of rebellion as 74th Hunger Game victors Katniss and Peeta visit the districts on their victory tour. The two have become symbols of defiance against the Capitol, and for that they will be targeted by the despotic President Snow and his regime.

programme.title: Made in Italy
programme.desc: The bohemian artist Robert travels to Tuscany with his estranged son Jack to fix the family's dilapidated house in order to sell it. But as they attempt to fix the house, they also mend their strained relationship.

programme.title: Don Jon
programme.desc: Jon knows plenty of women, but seems to prioritize his love for pornography over relationships. He meets Barbara at a nightclub, and she dumps him after she discovers his obsession, and on his quest to find another woman, he meets Esther, who tries to help him with his problem.

programme.title: The Ides of March
programme.desc: The film revolves around the US presidential elections, which is based on deception, with a specific look at US party policies, through the old legacies about corruption related to power, and it reveals an important investigation about the troubles of public life in America.

programme.title: Gulliver's Travels
programme.desc: Lemuel Gulliver, a traveling writer, finds himself in an island located in the Bermuda triangle, where he is a giant in comparison to its tiny citizens. He is held captive and eventually finds a way to help the people of Lilliput get rid of their Blefuscian enemies.

programme.title: The Way Back
programme.desc: Set in the beginning of the 1940's, three men escape from the Siberian militant camps in Russia and cross over all the way to India, a distance estimated to be around 4000 miles. During their journey, they are joined by a teenage girl and four other men, on a near-impossible mission.

programme.title: The Way Back

During their journey, they are joined by a teenage girl and four other men, on a near-impossible mission.

programme.title: Resurrecting the Champ
programme.desc: Eric Kernan works as a sports writer. His life becomes more complicated after his wife requests a divorce. One night Eric witnesses a gang of bandits attacking a poor man, noticing the man's skill in repelling their punches, and discovering that man is the legend of boxing (Bob Satterfield) who is rumored to be dead. Eric decides to write an article about Satterfield, but it doesn't stop there.

programme.title: Vicky Cristina Barcelona
programme.desc: Two girlfriends, Cristina and Vicky, one more rooted in sensuality and the other in logic and routine, travel to Barcelona and meet the charming painter Juan Antonio who becomes involved with both of them. Also in the mix is his passionate and unstable ex-wife, Maria.

programme.title: The Vanishing
programme.desc: On an isolated island off the Scottish coast, three lighthouse keepers come across a trunk loaded with gold, and their paranoia and greed lead them into a battle for survival.

programme.title: The Devil Wears Prada
programme.desc: Andrea recently graduated, and aspires to work in a fashion magazine, she accepts to work in one of the most famous magazines, but as a second assistant to the editor-in-chief Miranda, and in order to keep her job, Andrea must impress her tough and demanding boss.

programme.title: The Farewell
programme.desc: When her grandmother is diagnosed with terminal cancer, the headstrong Billi clashes with her parents over the decision to keep the diagnosis a secret from her grandmother. As the family gathers in China, ostensibly for a family wedding, they struggle to say goodbye without revealing the truth.

programme.title: Emperor
programme.desc: After the Japanese surrender at the end of World War II, General Fellers is assigned to determine if Emperor Hirohito will be hanged as a war criminal. Affecting his decision,is his search to find Aya, an exchange student he met years earlier in the U.S.

programme.title: Don Jon

programme.title: The Wrestler
programme.desc: Faded professional wrestler Randy 'The Ram' Robinson struggles to adjust to life outside the wrestling ring, as he juggles with keeping a small time job, mending his relationship with his estranged daughter and bonding with a stripper.

programme.title: Adaptation.
programme.desc: As screenwriter Charlie Kaufman struggles to write the screenplay adaptation of Susan Orlean's The Orchid Thief, his twin brother, Donald, moves in and disrupts his life.

programme.title: Hope Gap
programme.desc: After 29 years of marriage, Grace's life falls apart after her husband tells her he's leaving her for another, as she tries to adjust to the shocking news, she discovers a new side of herself.

programme.title: Life of Pi
programme.desc: Young boy Pi Patel is left adrift in the ocean after a storm wrecks the ship carrying his family and their zoo animals from India to Canada. He finds himself alone with a zebra, , a hyena and a Bengal tiger and the journey to fight for survival begins.
